class_notes: Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 14 - June 24, 2023. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: Development of cultural-linguistic fluency in the spoken language through discussions of contemporary issues in Italian culture. Emphasis on increasing vocabulary and ease in the manipulation of grammatical structure. Also used to designate language classes taken on semester programs in Italy.
sections: Class Nbr: 2349, Section #: 900, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: A. Porcarelli, Status: Open
